context_bundle.summary: Allow uncertainty pattern: Give AI permission to express 'I don't know' rather than guessing. Reduces hallucinations, increases reliability, builds trust. Prompt: 'If you don't have enough information, say: I don't have sufficient information to answer confidently. I would need [x] to provide accurate response.'

onboarding.quick_start: Allow uncertainty = permission to say 'I don't know'. Add to prompt: 'If unsure, explicitly state: I need [specific info] to answer confidently.' Benefits: reduces hallucinations, increases reliability, builds user trust. Critical for factual accuracy.
common_patterns: If you don't have enough information, say: 'I don't have sufficient information...'
Explicitly state what additional information would be needed
Use confidence scores in structured outputs
